alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 25 at 1:46PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Near the Taiya River. * WHEN...Until 700 PM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 143 PM AKDT, Minor flooding is expected to begin on Monday, especially near the Taiya River. Additional rainfall amounts of 3 to 4 inches are expected. - For Taiya River near Skagway: At 1:00pm Sunday the stage was 15.28 feet. Flood Stage is 16.5 feet. Forecast: A crest around 16.9 feet is expected Monday afternoon. Impacts: At 16.8 feet: Portions of the first few miles of the Chilkoot Trail will begin to inundate with water to ankle depth.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
